channel.title: Any one else have this problem? if not still read!help
channel.description: Ok so..heres the thing, i try to play mopar but now im getting a different error... ( like i dont have enuf ) and idk wut it is cuz my friend has a mac and the game works for him.. so heres the error in picture and words ( in case one doesnt show up ) Exception in thread "Thread-37" java.lang.outofmemoryError: Java heap space at rs.cache.Decompressor.decompress ( Decompressor . java : 32 ) at rs.client.streamLoaderForName ( client . java : 2940 ) at rs.client.startUp(client.java:5894 ) at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:39 ) at rs.client.run(client.java:3869 ) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:637

item.title: Any one else have this problem? if not still read!help
item.dc:creator: @cahhillbuddy cahhillbuddy
item.description:
@cahhillbuddy wrote:

Ok so…heres the thing, i try to play mopar but now im getting a different error… ( like i dont have enuf ) and idk wut it is cuz my friend has a mac and the game works for him… so heres the error in picture and words ( in case one doesnt show up )
Exception in thread “Thread-37” java.lang.outofmemoryError: Java heap space
at rs.cache.Decompressor.decompress ( Decompressor . java : 32 )
at rs.client.streamLoaderForName ( client . java : 2940 )
at rs.client.startUp(client.java:5894 )
at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:39 )
at rs.client.run(client.java:3869 )
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:637

Read full topic
